mission: Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu with lightning effects crashes through Knesset walls. CRASH! 'I am eternal!' Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke. WHOOSH! Coalition deals with exploding panels. BOOM! Juggling multiple corruption trials while texting. ZAP! Building settlements with energy beams. THWACK! Judicial reform controversy splits the nation. CRACK! 'Bibi will return... again!' WHAM! Israeli flag with lightning bolts.

script_processing.original_script: [VISUAL: Benjamin Netanyahu, engulfed in lightning, crashes through Knesset walls.] CRASH! DIALOGUE: 'I am eternal!' [VISUAL: Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke as coalition deals explode.] WHOOSH! BOOM! DIALOGUE: Deals explode! [VISUAL: Netanyahu juggles corruption trials while texting, settlements built with energy beams.] ZAP! THWACK! DIALOGUE: Juggling trials, building settlements! [VISUAL: Judicial reform controversy splits the nation with a crack visual.] CRACK! DIALOGUE: Judicial reform splits the nation! [VISUAL: Israeli flag with lightning bolts; Netanyahu declares his return.] WHAM! DIALOGUE: 'Bibi will return... again!'
script_processing.final_script: I am eternal! Deals explode across the nation, shattering the fragile peace. Juggling trials, I build settlements amidst the chaos. Judicial reform, a controversial act, deeply divides the nation. Bibi will return again, they say, bringing with her both hope and fear. The future is uncertain, a turbulent sea of possibilities. The people wait, their hearts heavy with anticipation. Will she bring salvation or further destruction? Only time will tell. The weight of the nation rests upon her shoulders. The path ahead is fraught with peril and uncertainty. Yet, she perseveres, driven by an unwavering determination. This is her destiny, her burden, her glory. The people's fate hangs in the balance. The weight of expectation is almost unbearable. But she remains resolute
